column5: This house is the perfect location with easy access to excitement of malls food and nightlife of Houston  This beautiful house has an open-kitchen layout that can fit 6 guest comfortably.   One queen size bed faces the wide windows. House provides Safe Quiet comfy stay additional bedding available in the living room with a queen sized sleeper sofa with 2 blow up beds and extra blankets in the closet.  You will feel right at home
column8: 2 bedroom Beautiful HOME in Quiet SW HOUSTON
